S

Sandbox - Class in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util
A sandbox is a (possibly remote and usually temporary) directory used for running jobs.
Sandbox(Files, Path, String) - Constructor for class nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util.Sandbox
Creates a sandbox.
Sandbox.Pair - Class in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util
Pair represents the combination of a source and destination path
Sandbox.Pair(Path, Path) - Constructor for class nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util.Sandbox.Pair
 
Scheduler - Interface in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs
Scheduler represents a (possibly remote) scheduler that can be used to submit jobs and retrieve queue information.

Streams - Interface in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs
Streams is a container for the standard input, output and error streams of a Job.
StreamUtils - Class in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util
StreamUtils contains various stream utilities that are used in Octopus itself, by other utilities, in examples, etc.
submitJob(Scheduler, JobDescription) - Method in interface nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs.Jobs

subpath(int, int) - Method in class nl.esciencecenter.octopus.files.Pathname

supportsBatch() - Method in interface nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs.Scheduler
Does this Scheduler support the submission of batch jobs ? For batch jobs the standard streams of the jobs are redirected from / to files.
supportsInteractive() - Method in interface nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs.Scheduler
Does this Scheduler supports the submission of interactive jobs ? For interactive jobs the standard streams of the job must be handled by the submitting process.
